title: EXP fiscal policy impacts GDP, PL in short run

content.question: If the government implements an expansionary fiscal policy, how will real gross domestic product (GDP) and the price level be affected in the short run?

choices.label: Real GDP Price Level Increase Decrease
Real GDP Price Level Decrease No change
Real GDP Price Level No change Increase
Real GDP Price Level Increase Increase
Real GDP Price Level Decrease Decrease

content.answer: Real GDP Price Level Increase Increase

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
